docs.lead_paragraph: It will be remembered that Col. CRAIG, the head of the Ordnance Dapartment, had the honor to fall under the displeasure of that prince of peculators and traitors, FLOYD; and that, to get rid of him, he was ordered to California in November last. docs.snippet: The steamship North Briton, from Liverpool on the 27th, vid Londonderry on the 28th ult., passed this Point to-day. She brings two days' later intelligence than that brought by the Great Eastern.

docs.snippet: Mr. TEN EYCK presented a petition from citi-  zens of New-Jersey, that in case of the Naval Academy being permanently removed from Annapolis, to create the same at Perth Amboy. Mr. TEN EYCE, in a few brief remarks, presented the advantages and...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. TEN EYCK presented a petition from citi- zens of New-Jersey, that in case of the Naval Academy being permanently removed from Annapolis, to create the same at Perth Amboy. Mr. TEN EYCE, in a few brief remarks, presented the advantages and facilities Perth Amboy afforded for naval school.

docs.snippet: The People vs. Andrew J. Hackley. This case was the only matter taken up by the Court yesterday.  Mr. Waterbury moved that Mr. Hackley be called and that his bail be forfeited.

headline.main: Hackley still Ill His Case Postponed until the Second Tuesday in August.; COURT OF OYER AND TERMINER.

docs.lead_paragraph: The People vs. Andrew J. Hackley. This case was the only matter taken up by the Court yesterday. Mr. Waterbury moved that Mr. Hackley be called and that his bail be forfeited.
